great.cooked chicken: high in protein, easy to digest
great.cooked turkey: high in protein, supports muscle health
great.cooked fish: rich in omega-3 fatty acids, supports skin and coat
great.cooked eggs: good source of protein and essential amino acids

dangerous.raw fish/eggs: risk of bacteria or thiamine deficiency
dangerous.bones: risk of choking or internal injury
